ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/16/99 9:14:53 AM Pacific Daylight Time, kim@stormhaven.org writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/16/99 9:14:53 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
kim@... writes:

<< I've seen it advertised from as low as 10pp to 100pp. The big
difference between the dirk and other special weapons is that
the mob who carries it spawns often, and has it every time.
It is going to cause a serious realignment of prices for
weapons in the L15-25 range. I personally wouldn't pay more
than about 15pp for one, maybe 20pp if I were in Qeynos >>


Heh... I was in West Commonlands yesterday and someone was selling the
dirk. She wanted me to make the first bid and laughed at 50 plat. She said
the lowest she would go would be 120 plat. In fact, a guildmate said he's
seen them go for over 300 plat... I guess I'll pick one up when I'm in
Faydwer next time.


Amhran Fasach, gypsy bard of the Soerbaird
Fennin Ro
